predicate.note: Frames file for 'gripe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` For $ 10 million [*U*] , you can move $ 100 million [*U*] of stocks , '' a specialist on the Big Board gripes [*T*-1] .
example.arg: a specialist on the Big Board
